title: Daily Steps
details: Track the number of steps you take each day to ensure you meet your daily activity goals.

title: Calories Burned
details: Monitor the calories burned during your workouts and daily activities to manage your energy balance.

title: Distance Covered
details: Keep track of the distance you cover while walking, running, or engaging in other physical activities.

title: Workout Duration
details: Log the duration of your workouts to ensure you're meeting your fitness goals for each session.

title: Heart Rate
details: Monitor your heart rate during workouts to gauge the intensity and effectiveness of your exercises.

title: Sleep Patterns
details: Track your sleep patterns, including duration and quality, to ensure you're getting restful sleep for recovery.
